text: Agadɨ ala hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavalɨ agɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ sɨhɨ iahɨbalu aba mɨgudɨbavɨci uami. Viaŋ ciaŋ sɨbaŋ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ ciaŋ hutesɨ sɨbaŋ ma abɨben uami. Nɨbɨlaŋ sɨhɨvia igahɨlahɨla saŋ Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ human limu fɨhala hameŋ cɨki agɨladɨ aba aba lamalubiben uami.
